channel.title: [PI] Enabling PvP Drops?
channel.description: Need help ofc, title says it all. The source was a heavily edited DSPK, not sure of the name. Enabling PvP Drops, help?

item.title: [PI] Enabling PvP Drops?
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

I don’t understand what you mean…, if you mean, you loose stuff when you kill an admin+ but you don’t get loot, that’s because their player rights+ if you fighted a normal player or player rights 1 you’d get PVP loots for sure.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Enabling PvP Drops?
item.dc:creator: @Roxee Roxee™
item.description:
@Roxee wrote:

nah bro i already saw, it wasnt pvp drops (disabled) it was that when u kill an owner they lose shit but u dont get lmao, i killed my gf (who was co owner)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Enabling PvP Drops?
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

“Not heavily edited (IHybrid) :)” and I don’t think there even is PVP drops in that source that I know of, if there isn’t your going to have to add them yourself;

PlayerAssiant/Player/Client.java/ItemAssiant/ClickingButtons/DialogueHandler.

www.google.com, I already found 5 in a minute.

Read full topic
